term.title: Schulze–Hardy rule

item.text: The generalization that the critical coagulation concentration for a typical lyophobic sol is extremely sensitive to the valence of the counter-ions (high valence gives a low critical coagulation concentration).

item.title: counter-ions (in colloid chemistry) (in an ion exchanger, in colloid chemistry)
